name: The Observers
description:
You wake in the middle of the night to buy some milk from the shop, but after a while weird things starts happening

This game is inspired by "The Man in the Park" and "The Smiling Man" and I made it with Unreal Engine 4 in about 3 weeks

It's my first ps1 style game, I think it turned out quite good

Controls:

WASD - Move

E - Interact
